apiKey.title: Service Account Token
apiKey.description: Service Account Token to authenticate to the Grafana APIs. Use Service Account Tokens (format: glsa_xxxx) for authentication. Legacy API Keys are no longer supported by Grafana as of January 2025. Both self-hosted and Grafana Cloud are supported. Requires Admin role for full metadata extraction.

verifySSL.title: Verify SSL
verifySSL.description: Boolean marking if we need to verify the SSL certs for Grafana. Default to True.
